Gerard Piqué intervenes for Neymar to stay

The Neymar Case has turned as a sock in the last hours. Right now, the Brazilian soccer player is closer to staying at Barça than going to Paris Saint Germain. If last Thursday the operation was going, at that moment there was a meeting between some heavyweights of the dressing room with the Brazilian. At that moment, the only thing that could stop Neymar's farewell was a change of opinion and this is what would have happened after these conversations with his colleagues, of a meeting with Josep Maria Bartomeu of which he informed Moisés Llorens in the newspaper AS and, as RAC1 has learned, of a conversation with Gerard Piqué.


Catalan defense has played an important role in the change of opinion of Neymar. In the morning from Thursday to Friday, Piqué picked up his teammate in the players' hotel with the intention that the Brazilian would change his mind. The Catalan central questioned Neymar with some harshness asking him for explanations of what was happening and made him see that he could not deal with Barça, that the Barça club had given him a lot and that the time will come for him to be the Leader of the team. According to Piqué, the PSG is not the most suitable rival: with the investment that Parisians should do to get it out of the Camp Nou, they would be required to win everything and it would be a problem for him to have so much Pressure on top. To finish off, Piqué let him go that Dani Alves, which should be an important element for Neymar in Paris, would not save him from all the evils.

The economic conditions must be the same as it currently has with Barça.
